alert.note: Alert for Hubbard; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Hubbard and northwestern Wadena Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sebeka, or 37 miles east of Detroit Lakes, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Menahga around 205 PM CDT. Huntersville around 215 PM CDT. Hubbard around 220 PM CDT. Park Rapids around 230 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
